page.title: 12Events in Newburgh
page.content: There are lots of events that happen in Newburgh for a place with very few people.The most popular event is the Angling Contest.150 teams take part. Each team consists of three people. The prize for that is the Press and Journal Trophy. Newburgh is a very good place for Wind-surfing.There is a competition held about twice a year.The event is held in the estuary. There is also a football match in which the married men play the single men. There is a community club where you can play Badminton,learn Judo and Gymnastics.You also get Brownies,Cubs, Guides and Scouts.The clubs which organise these events are the W.R.I.Womans Rural Institute,the Village Hall Committee,Golf Club and the PTA Parent Teacher Association.
